top_comment.author: Clash of Clans Raids

comments.text:
+Jimmy Bobjohn have you tried gaining trophies from defense ? i wanna know 
if they are still many farmers at crystal.. or just most of them are trophy 
pushing
comments.author: Jim Suñaz

comments.text:
personally I let myself get attacked in crystal 2 about 15 times then I 
played a whole weekend training armies for the enemy bases and revenged 
them, I did this for a couple days and it got me there. It was a lot of 
trophy management and if you leave your th out you do run the risk of 
getting 2 starred by people that use strategies such as barch to push. 
Trophies are based by where the enemy is not their town hall. If you 
revenge someone while in crystal 2 that is in masters you could get a 60 
cup offer where if you revenge someone also in crystal 2 it may only be 
30-40 still
comments.author: Jimmy Bobjohn

comments.text:
+Jimmy Bobjohn okay.. i wanna get your opinion on this since i wanna push 
to masters at th8... lets say you attack a base at crystal and you normally 
 get 2 stars and get like 20 trophies of the 30 available... if you leave 
your th outside.. someone can snipe it out and get 7-10 trophies...and you 
can revenge it and get 2 stars and get 25-30 trophies of the 45 trophies 
available... does that just makes it even when attacking a higher townhall 
??.. yes you can get more if you revenge someone you can basically 3 
stars..but it is worth it ?? or should i just put my resources outside and 
let farmers take it... besides you get more trophies on defense than on 
attacking... just wanna know your opinion
comments.author: Jim Suñaz

comments.text:
sorry man but I don't use app bounty or any of those they never seemed to 
work for me
comments.author: Jimmy Bobjohn

comments.text: Plz guys type in my app bounty code: bisolefo
comments.author: Patrick Shannon

comments.text:
I was a th8 and when i pushed to masters i actually preferred to have my th 
outside. There are some nice th9-10 like me in crystal that just hit the th 
then leave and since mine is outside also you can probably revenge for more 
trophies. This brought me a ton of success but maybe not for you. Good luck 
with your push!
comments.author: Jimmy Bobjohn
